text: So first off the wife and I have lived in Kingwood for about five years and have always talked about getting dinner from here, we'll today we did.. We ordered using the online app and it was simple as could be, we got some Chicken Alfredo â€¦More

name: Russ & Jenn Tenhoff
text: Clean and the wings are the best! They were short staffed though, and the waitress had a bit of an attitude because of it. Guess the management needs an overhaul.

name: jessica staton
text: Not good... dunno if they changed something about their pizza but it was awful and the cheese sticks werenâ€™t done. They did redo them but the middle ones are still mushyðŸ¤®

name: Justin Parsell
text: The best pizza hut pizza I've ever had! I travel to Camp Dawson monthly for military training and never miss an opportunity to order from them. I order online and it's is always ready and exactly as I order whenever I come to pick up. Great tasting too!! Definitely recommend

name: Misty Arbogast
text: They still have the buffet at this location.

name: Steve Radich
text: Great food, good service

name: Ed King
text: This Pizza Hut is in a new building, therefore it is very clean. The service and quality of food is exemplary as well. I would highly recommend this establishment.

name: Alana Moreland
text: Fast, friendly service. Our waiter was very attentive, and the food was good. The store was clean, and the experience was nice.

name: Clayton Mileto
text: The manager adam was wonderful, the staff was friendly, and the food was perfect.

name: Amber Adams
text: This Pizza Hut location recently got a brand new building that looks very nice, is very well kept and is nice and cozy. It's a wonderful place to bring the family out to eat and it is affordable so it won't break the bank. The table service â€¦More

name: Amy Moats
text: Always good pizza

name: E.P. McDonough
text: Great location right there in Kingwood, close to Hardee's, Subway, Tractor Supply, and Smokin'Country BBQ. The pizza buffet is a great lunch option and the staff at the Kingwood Pizza Hut are super helpful and very good at providing great service. And that's why I keep going back, again and again.

name: Duane Ingalls
text: Not a fan of the reduced menu

name: Vijay Prithiv Bathey
text: The best Pizza hut I have seen in the USA. Its got a family dine in and the service is incredibly fast. We ordered for a pizza while driving to the Monongahela National Forest in WV and we came across this store. We ordered when we were 10 mins away and to my surprise is was ready when we reached there. Clean and friendly service.

name: Angelatd th d stonebraker
text: Buffett was delicious. Staff was very friendly

name: Roger Hurst
text: Most updated dining room out of any pizza hut i have been too .

name: Lena Cline
text: We called in for dining about 5 minutes ahead. So are wait was very short. The pizza was get. The kids loved their personal pan pizza for Book It. A great program! Thanks pizza hut for inspiring my kids to read!

text: Thay know how to make good pizza

name: George Ray

name: Paddy Gator
text: I order my meals to go online. The order is always ready when I show up, and always HOT. The staff is very friendly and super nice! I really enjoy the wings. About the best wings I ever had! Yummo! I also always get the hand tossed meat lovers pizza, and it never fails. Always hot and tasty.
